name: Mad Crown
description: Mad Crown is a roguelike RPG set in a post-apocalyptic dieselpunk world. As an explorer, you are in search of the legendary crown. Make use of limited resources and meticulous tactics to battle an eerie enemy through the procedurally generated dungeons of a mutated world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7/8/10 Processor: 1.7 GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or RadeonÂ® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
